channel.title: Sdwan on NetWithAlex
channel.description: Recent content in Sdwan on NetWithAlex

item.title: Quick Guide: Control vs Data Policies in Cisco SD-WAN
item.description: Learn the key differences between Cisco SD-WAN control and data policies, when to use each, and how they impact routing and traffic forwarding

item.title: Getting Started with SD-WAN Automation
item.description: Learn the fundamentals of SD-WAN automation and how to get started with scripting and APIs to streamline your network operations.

item.title: AppQoe Series: Packet Duplication
item.description: Learn how Packet Duplication can help you reliably transmit critical traffic over unreliable transports to making sure your application.

item.title: AppQoe Series: Forward Error Correction (FEC)
item.description: Learn how Forward Error Correction (FEC) works in Cisco SD-WAN to improve application performance over lossy links. Explore use cases, configuration insights, and testing results.

item.title: Cisco SD-WAN On-Prem ZTP: Automating Router Onboarding
item.description: Plug and Play (PnP) lets you onboard SD-WAN devices automatically via Cisco Cloud. This post explains how to achieve zero-touch provisioning (ZTP) in an airgapped, on-premises environment.

item.title: AppQoe Series: TCP Optimization
item.description: Discover how SD-WAN enhances TCP performance. Learn about key optimization techniques that improve application reliability and user experience.

item.title: Securing the Edge with Cisco SD-WAN and Secure Access
item.description: Discover how Cisco SD-WAN and Cisco Secure Access work together to enhance network performance and security in an internet first world.

item.title: Enhanced Application Aware Routing
item.description: Learn the benefits of enhanced app aware routing and how to implement it on your network
